command_line: mkdir -p circos/conf/ circos/data/ &&  ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/7/0/c/dataset_70cad4ca-f501-49fa-9a28-ac0a9f5d2c8a.dat' genomeref.fa &&  python '/cvmfs/cloud.galaxyproject.org/tools/toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/circos/df7356989ac1/circos/karyotype-from-fasta.py' genomeref.fa > circos/conf/karyotype.txt &&  python '/cvmfs/cloud.galaxyproject.org/tools/toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/circos/df7356989ac1/circos/karyotype-colors.py' `grep -c '^chr\s' 'circos/conf/karyotype.txt'` > 'circos/conf/karyotype-colors.conf' &&  touch circos/conf/karyotype-colors.conf &&    cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/7/configs/tmpbyzhnj7j' circos/conf/circos.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/7/configs/tmprierk66x' circos/conf/ticks.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/7/configs/tmp7iiwb6br' circos/conf/ideogram.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/7/configs/tmp37uyvnzk'  circos/conf/data.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/7/configs/tmpx7c5hmtx'  circos/conf/links.conf && cp '/galaxy/server/database/jobs_directory/000/7/configs/tmp9hrestdx' circos/conf/galaxy_test_case.json &&  cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/e/6/8/dataset_e68f55e7-8ae2-4493-af0e-a2fea47b7c2c.dat' circos/data/data-0.txt && cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/e/6/8/dataset_e68f55e7-8ae2-4493-af0e-a2fea47b7c2c.dat' circos/data/data-1.txt && cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/c/e/3/dataset_ce3f147e-97ff-424b-867a-729009355a2a.dat' circos/data/data-2.txt &&  cp '/galaxy/server/database/objects/2/a/d/dataset_2ad43880-d1c1-4248-9e6e-133c54ef9269.dat' circos/data/links-0.txt &&   circos -conf circos/conf/circos.conf -noparanoid

params.ideogram: {"angle_offset": "-90", "angle_orientation": "clockwise", "bands": {"band_stroke_color": "#000000", "band_stroke_thickness": "0", "band_transparency": "3", "fill_bands": true, "show_bands": true}, "chromosomes_reverse": null, "ideogram_labels": {"parallel": true, "radius_offset": "0.075", "show_label": true, "size": "24"}, "limit_chromosomes": null, "pairwise_spacing": [], "radius": "0.9", "spacing": "0.5", "thickness": "30.0", "units": "kb"}
